title: Deserter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot a player at night.
- Make your vote count twice during the day.
- Wear a bulletproof vest at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have one bullet.
- You have two vests.
- You may increase your voting power three times.
- You will appear suspicious to Sheriffs, and as a random enemy role in the game to evil faction investigative abilities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the game end.

desc:
Post 249
*To you, you were the one above all. That is why you have to live.*
